  1. Open nRF Connect
  2. Turn on scooter
  3. Get address of scooter - start scanner on nRD Connect
  4. Connect to scooter
  5. Enable Developer Options on your Phone - Tap 7 times on build number under settings
  6. Enable Bluetooth HCI snoop log under developer options
  7. Turn bluetooth off and on, Restart phone
  8. start official app send commands
  9. Turn off bluetooth
  10. Start full bug report under developer options
  11. Open Log file with wire shark
